bill.title: Retirement; first responders who served in coast counties during Hurricane Katrina shall receive extra PERS credit.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-11-109, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Any Vested Member Of The Public Employees' Retirement System Who Served As A First Responder In Hancock, Harrison Or Jackson County During The Period From August 29, 2005, Through September 5, 2005, And Who Served As A First Responder With The Same Agency Or Political Subdivision For Not Less Than One Year Thereafter, Shall Be Entitled To Additional Creditable Service In The System For That Service As A First Responder At No Cost, Not To Exceed One Year Of Creditable Service; And For Related Purposes.
